channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW10 Potholes problem, 30th September
item.description:

item.title: Footpath ploughed, 30th September
item.description:
Footpath at the edge of a field has been ploughed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stump Lane, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Street light out on Willow Close, 30th September
item.description:
First street light on the right as you turn into Willow close off Juniper way. Cant mark the spot exactly as fixmystreet doesnt think its a public road (it was adopted years ago)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
